text: 6:2-3 Jon 13:14-15; Rom 12:3; 15:1; 1 Korin 8:2; 2 Korin 3:5; 1 Tesalonika 5:14; 1 Jon 4:21Eghtɨ gumazitam suam, a ziar ekiam iti, puvatɨ, a ziam pu, egha kamaghɨn gumazir kam uabɨra uabɨ gifari. Ia igharaz darazir akuragh men osɨmtɨziba ater. Egh ia kamaghɨn damuva, guizbangɨra Kraisɨn arazibar gɨn mangam.
